data.name: Per Scholas Security Labs
data.description: Hands-on labs from the Per Scholas Cybersecurity Analyst program, including Cisco Packet Tracer networking builds, SOC-style investigations, firewall rules, VPNs, and security troubleshooting.

data.name: Cloud Security & VPC Labs
data.description: AWS-focused labs including VPC design, public/private subnets, security groups, IAM, EC2 hardening, and secure web server deployment as part of cloud security practice.

data.name: Personal Cyber Labs
data.description: Independent projects, web security testing, SOC simulations, and enumeration labs.
